DCF14D5B-7438-443B-9A00-A5D19621F036.text: This action runs a Python script that can be configured with your own parameters. Tap the options (▼) button to edit the script or the parameters that are shown here. This comment is actually a text parameter itself – feel free to remove it.

parameters.__custom_action_script__:
#coding: utf-8

import workflow,ui,webbrowser,urllib2,json

params = workflow.get_parameters()

nm = 'https://bible-api.com/BOOK+CHAPTER:VERSE'
bk = params['Book']
chap = params['Chapter']
vrs = params['Verse']
nm_edited = 'https://bible-api.com/{}+{}:{}'.format(bk,chap,vrs)
#webbrowser.open(nm_edited)

data = json.load(urllib2.urlopen(nm_edited))
ref = data['reference']
trans = data['translation_name']
txt = data['text']
pretty='\n'+str(txt)
workflow.set_output(pretty)

#print(data)

#coding: utf-8
import workflow,editor

# Get the custom parameters as a dictionary (titles are keys):
params = workflow.get_parameters()
text = params['text']
# Get the action's input (a string):
action_in = workflow.get_input()
editor.insert_text(text)
#...

workflow.set_output(text)
